login.login_description: Being logged allows {{conName}} to send you personal messages. You can also use it to participate in the Fursuit Games and register for tables at the Artist Alley.
login.login_hint:
Your login credentials for the app are the same as for the Eurofurence Registration System.

If you do not remember or have access to them, you can ask for a PIN code
to sign in at the registration desk or security office.
